column5: FINALLY GOT THE PARTS IN FOR THE TRAILER AND FIXED IT UP THIS MORN!!! HIT THE SIDE OF THE LAKE WE NORMALLY DONT FOR A FEW HRS!!! FISHIN WAS TUFF!!! HAD A FEW RISES BUT ONLY MANAGED TO SINK THE HOOK INTO ONE!!!  BACK TO THE USUAL HAUNTING GROUNDS NEXT WEEK  LOL
nice looking fish! Thanks for sharing.

Was out there as well and had about the same day as you if you makes you feel any better (didn't sound like anyone had a good day out there from what we heard).  Ah well, its a day on the water right?
Nice bass!  At least you got out!
You didn't have your good luck charm with you!
MY LUCKY CHARM TOOK OFF  LOL
Scugog was tough this weekend. Good to see someone caught something.
Great report and pic CANADIAN_COPPER  Good looking bass! Thanks for sharing Leechman
Maybe they heard the Cops were coming and high tailed it out of there!  lol, just kidding.  Bluebird sky and tough fishing go hand in hand for me.  At least you got into a decent Bass.  WTG!
At least you got out there and caught a fish!!!  We didn't even wet a line this past weekend!  Good job Scott.....the steelies will be running soon....polished the dust off trout gear yet?

we were out on Sunday as well, and did about as good as you did. We started out by Cesarea with not much luck and went to the Scugog river and couldn't find anything so we went back around cesarea and ended our day.
Nice bass Scott.  Way to go  Joey
Funny enough, the cops have been out the last two weekends. They have been thoroughly checking every boat in Scugog. The one officer mentioned that he handed out 16 tickets two weekends ago.
